scenario_text.value: (This is...)

(Kaito said people never come here, but it’s
breathtaking. It’s also kinda eerie...)

How could anyone expect visitors to come to
a shrine all the way out here?

They didn’t. In fact, they made sure to warn
anyone about getting too close.

That’s strange...
I don’t see the others anywhere.

I could’ve sworn I saw someone just now.
Now where could they be?

We should all look around and see what we can
find.

This shrine... Nothing looks out of place
here.

Check out this place... There are crazy
patterns all over.

(Minoru’s snapping tons of photos on his
phone. Huh, didn’t know he was into that.)

I bet they’ve got some freaky demon statue
stowed away in there or something!

I don’t know about that... But whatever they
worship here isn’t normal, that’s for sure.

What’s this, some sort of animal? A bird?
Wait...a reptile?

There are patterns of various animals all
over...but I don’t recognize any of them.

Ooo, what’s this! A lion? A dog? Wait, a
lion-dog?! Man, I just eat this stuff UP!

Dammit, Minoru! Now’s not the time to be
taking pictures!
What? Maaan...

(Shuuji’s right, we have to look for Saki and
the others.)

(Still, this place is so weird, I’m not
surprised Minoru wanted a few mementos...)
(Minoru sure is enjoying himself...)
Enough photos.
Take more over here!
Let him have his fun.
Enough photos.

Enough with the photos, Minoru. All of us
need to focus on the search.
Right. Let’s find them as fast as we can.
I’m sure this place is making them uneasy.
All right, already...
There’s more here!
Hey, Minoru! There’s more of them here!
Oh? Lemme see!
Not you too, Takuma!

Leave them. We’ll look on our own if we have
to.
We may need them.
Actually, we may need the pictures later.
What do you mean?

If we take pics of the area we might notice
something we would’ve overlooked otherwise.

Oh, I see. We, well if that’s the reason,
I guess it’s okay...

Come on, already. We have to find them, and
fast.
Right, sorry. Okay, let’s go.

Wow... This shrine really does worship
beasts...

There are places like this all over Japan.
Some worship octopuses...or weird-ass trees...

Some pretty popular ones even worship
lewd stuff!
Hey, watch that talk! There’s a lady present!
Minoru...

I wonder... Is this the place passed down in
the legends we were supposed to visit today?
Legends? Who knows...

As I said, I was told not to set foot in
here. I don’t know much about it.

But the locals say people get spirited away
up in here.
I see. That’s...certainly frightening...

What was that sound? I’ve never heard
anything like it!

Just trees creaking in the wind or something.
Who cares, let’s go, let’s go!
Um, hey guys, don’t stray too far, okay?

(The blizzard might not be the only thing we
have to worry about. Let’s look for clues.)
